channel.title: Posts on Mr. V's Blog

item.title: Bootstrap
item.description: Ok, let’s start! It is some time now since I first though to start a blog, but I always posponed it. I was not sure about the topic to focus on, and more in general I always found some excuse to push back. Now, with the COVID-19 pandemic situation and the constrinction to spend so much time at home with myself I decided that there are no more excuses that holds.
